member.name: PSS_QUERY_INFORMATION_CLASS
member.summary: Specifies what information PssQuerySnapshot function returns.

member.name: PSS_QUERY_INFORMATION_CLASS.PSS_QUERY_PROCESS_INFORMATION
member.summary: Returns a PSS_PROCESS_INFORMATION structure, with information about the original process.

member.name: PSS_QUERY_INFORMATION_CLASS.PSS_QUERY_VA_CLONE_INFORMATION
member.summary: Returns a PSS_VA_CLONE_INFORMATION structure, with a handle to the VA clone.

member.name: PSS_QUERY_INFORMATION_CLASS.PSS_QUERY_AUXILIARY_PAGES_INFORMATION
member.summary: Returns a PSS_AUXILIARY_PAGES_INFORMATION structure, which contains the count of auxiliary pages captured.

member.name: PSS_QUERY_INFORMATION_CLASS.PSS_QUERY_VA_SPACE_INFORMATION
member.summary: Returns a PSS_VA_SPACE_INFORMATION structure, which contains the count of regions captured.

member.name: PSS_QUERY_INFORMATION_CLASS.PSS_QUERY_HANDLE_INFORMATION
member.summary: Returns a PSS_HANDLE_INFORMATION structure, which contains the count of handles captured.

member.name: PSS_QUERY_INFORMATION_CLASS.PSS_QUERY_THREAD_INFORMATION
member.summary: Returns a PSS_THREAD_INFORMATION structure, which contains the count of threads captured.

member.name: PSS_QUERY_INFORMATION_CLASS.PSS_QUERY_HANDLE_TRACE_INFORMATION
member.summary: Returns a PSS_HANDLE_TRACE_INFORMATION structure, which contains a handle to the handle trace section, and its size.

member.name: PSS_QUERY_INFORMATION_CLASS.PSS_QUERY_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS
member.summary: Returns a PSS_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS structure, which contains various performance counters.
